title: Vuelta a España Stage 17: Kaden Groves Making Green Jersey His with Another Win
content:
Long-range breakaway braves wet conditions at the Vuelta but is caught close to the end by late attack: 'Win number three is special'

Read the full article at Vuelta a España Stage 17: Kaden Groves Making Green Jersey His with Another Win on Velo.
author: sstokes
